description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 19th March 2019 (RN: 18/07737/FULL) for 'Alterations to all elevations of the property to include the installation of balconies and extended windows to create doors; installation of plant at main roof level and lower ground floor level; use of lower ground floor as 6 residential flats (Class C3) and reconfiguration of the existing residential units on the upper floors of the property; extension at lower ground floor level within the existing lightwell and at all floor levels on the Hay's Mews elevation; alterations at main roof level including the creation of an internal residential amenity space' (SITE INCLUDES 27A HAY'S MEWS), NAMELY, to amend the drawings to remove of a number of balconies at all floor levels; relocation of the residential cycle parking; alterations to the layouts of residential units at ground and lower ground floor levels; new windows at ground and lower ground floor levels and use of render instead of the approved Portland Stone. (Application under Section 73)
